oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: F. Bostick Wester show (KYOR) w/ guest Smokey Smith - 1948-03-06 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of a broadcast of F. Bostick Wester's KYOR radio program, featuring guest Smokey Smith. Originally broadcast 1948-03-06 at 1:00 pm. Smokey announces that he is to appear at a barn dance at the American Legion Hall in La Mesa on Saturday, March 13, 1948.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Smokey Smith
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Station announcement -- Opening statement (F. Bostick Wester) -- Gold Coast Express (Smokey Smith) -- F. Bostick Wester and Smokey Smith talk -- I Wonder If You Meant To Break My Heart? (Smokey Smith) -- Smokey Smith and F. Bostick Wester talk -- Shenandoah Waltz (Smokey Smith) -- Smokey Smith reads poem The Old-Time Family -- Smokey Smith announces an upcoming appearance -- Smokey Smith and F. Bostick Wester talk -- Signed Sealed and Delivered (Smokey Smith) -- Smokey Smith and F. Bostick Wester talk -- (Last Night) I Heard You Crying In Your Sleep (Smokey Smith) -- Smokey Smith and F. Bostick Wester talk -- I'm A Fool To Care (Smokey Smith)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KYOR (Radio station : San Diego, Calif.); Smith, Smokey, 1922-; Wester, Bostick, 1914-1998
